definitions.definition: to repeat something you have heard, or to broadcast a signal, message, or programme on television or radio:
examples: I was told the news first and then I relayed it to the others.

definitions.definition: a group of people who continue an activity that others from the same team or organization have been doing previously:
examples: Relays of workers kept the machines going through the night.

definitions.definition: a running or swimming race between two or more teams in which each person in the team runs or swims part of the race
